page.title: 08LEEDS AND BRADFORD AIRPORT
page.content: {Terminal Building Because of the Extension to the runway the terminal also had to be extended. It was to be done in 3 phases.The first phase was the terminal arrivals area.Phase 2 which is being done now is the spotting and food areas.Phase 3 has not yet been discussed. {If There was a Crash at Yeadon. Fire engines would be first on the scene.Ambulances would not be there as quickly because the nearest station is in Menston which is 1 mile away.But Leeds and Bradford airport have one just in case of a bad crash. { {Yeadon in the Future.}We hope to get more aircraft,more passengers and spotters.This year its half the world and after that it's the whole WORLD. Compiled by {TIM HEELEY}and {LEE PARR.
